title: Strengthening Instructional Competencies: ICT Readiness for BYOD-Based Secondary Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics pedagogy and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply the six ICT readiness indicators (understanding, curriculum, pedagogy, technology, organizational management, teacher learning) when designing math classes in a BYOD environment
Learners can complete at least three projects integrating and sharing internet-based educational resources using Guidelinks and LDSoft applications
Learners can produce at least two actual lesson scenarios using developed tools and derive improvements through peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
